wikipedia_page.main: The Reverend Pierre Jacques Smit (1863–1960), who often signed his works Peter Smit, Peter J. Smit, or P.J. Smit, was a natural history illustrator of the Victorian era in England.

response: * The Reverend Pierre Jacques Smit (1863 – 1960) an illustrator at the British Natural History Museum
His son Pierre Jacques Smit (born October 1863 at Leiderdorp – 1960), who used the name Peter Smit, was also a zoological illustrator.
:for the children's writer, see Peter Smit (writer); for the natural history illustrator, see Pierre Jacques Smit
* Pierre Jacques Smit (1863–1960), Dutch natural history illustrator in England
